page.title: 08Morden in 1985
page.content: Morden is a small suberb in the London Borough of Merton.There is a shopping centre,underground station (the furthest outside inner London) and Crown House the head office of all the schools in Merton.Morden's high street is not very good but can be useful if needed.Amongst the amenities in Morden there is a Chinese take away,an Indian take away and two fish and chip shops. Opening in August 1985 is a new Prestos supermarket replacing the old store inbetween Crown Lane and London Road.In Crown Lane there is a shop called Christopher Stephen which is the main uniform retail shop for most Merton schools.Down the main High Street is a Wimpey,a branch of Woolworths and a video shop.There are many small shops dotted over the place.In Abbotsbury Road there is the local post office and other shops.
